title: Engtin nge ni ka Chhandamtu
lyrics:
Engtin nge ni ka Chhandamtu
Thisenah hlawkna hlu ka hmuh?
Thihna rapthlak tuartirtu, kei,
Ka tan a lo thih tak ni le
Hmangaihna mak engtin nge ni 2
Ka tan Pathian i lo thih le?

A va mak em, thi thei lo thi!
A tumzia mak tu nge sawi thei?
A hmangaih thukzia puang turin,
Seraf-te pawhin an phak lo.
Khawngaihna mak leiin fak se, 2
Angel pawhin zawng tawh suh se

A pa lalthutthleng rawn pelin,
Kan tan a khawngaih tawp nei lo!
Hmangaih chauh lo chu hlip vekin,
Adam thlah sual bo tan a thi.
Khawngaihna mak a thlawn a ni. 2
Aw, ka Pathian min zawng hmu ta

Rei tak ka thla saltang tawh kha,
A rum khawvel sual thim hnuaiah;
I hmel eng chu a lo lang a,
Nungin ka tho ta, i engah.
Phuarna a phelh, ka zalen ta, 2
Thovin ka kal, ka zui ta che.

Thiam loh chang reng ka hlau tawh lo'ng,
Isua ka ta, kei ama ta;
Mi nung, Krista zawmin ka nung,
Pathian felna ka inthuamna.
Lalthuthleng chu ka pan ngam ta, 2
Kraun hlu Krista zarah ka ta.
